summary: Extended WezTerm task number integration to work when Claude Code runs inside Neovim. Created neotex/lib/wezterm.lua module for OSC 1337 emission and added terminal monitoring to autocmds.lua that detects task commands and updates tab title.

artifacts.summary: WezTerm OSC 1337 SetUserVar emission module with base64 encoding
Added Claude Code terminal monitoring for task number detection

completion_data.completion_summary: Extended WezTerm task number integration for Neovim-embedded Claude Code. Created neotex/lib/wezterm.lua module for OSC 1337 emission and added Claude Code terminal monitoring to autocmds.lua with debouncing, buffer-local tracking, and proper cleanup.

next_steps: Manual verification: Open WezTerm > Neovim > :ClaudeCode > /research 791 and check tab title shows #791
